Together we are #MALANG! ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ Pleased to announce my first with all these talented artists – @mohitsuri @adityaroykapur @dishapatani & @khemster2! @malangfilm releasing on Valentine’s 2020. ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ @tseries.official @luv_films #BhushanKumar #LuvRanjan @gargankur82 @jayshewakramani
A post shared by anilskapoor (@anilskapoor) on Mar 3, 2019 at 7:58pm PST
title: Anil Kapoor Shares A Picture From His Next Film & Everyone’s Convinced He Is Ageing In Reverse
description: Do you know Anil Kapoor is 62 years old? If you are screaming because you’re shocked, we won’t judge you. We almost had a similar reaction too. Anil Kapoor recently shared a picture with the cast of Malang, his forthcoming film. What was supposed to be an announcement of a film, turned into memes and jokes, because people just couldn’t stop wondering if Anil Kapoor is 62 years old or 26 years old.
